abstract: The European Commission was on the verge of proposing a curb on drilling until an inquiry into the causes of the explosion at a BP rig was completed.
snippet: The European Commission was on the verge of proposing a curb on drilling until an inquiry into the causes of the explosion at a BP rig was completed.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  As the United States lifted its moratorium on deepwater oil drilling Tuesday, the European Commission was on the verge of proposing a curb on drilling in extreme conditions until an inquiry into the causes of the fatal explosion at a BP rig in the Gulf of Mexico was completed.

headline.main: Europe Considers a Curb on Deepwater Drilling
headline.print_headline: Europe Considers a Curb on Deepwater Drilling
